lejos.util
Class ButtonCounter

java.lang.Object
  lejos.util.ButtonCounter

public class ButtonCounter
extends Object

This is class is for data entry using the NXT keyboard. Counts number of presses of left and right buttons
Press ENTER together with LEFT or RIGHT to decrease the count. The count will continue to change as long as the buttons are held down. Press ESCAPE to end counting. Displays the count as it is entered, and makes a sound with each button press.

Author:
Roger Glassey 8/20/07
